group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was approved by Cleveland Clinic Institutional Review Board protocol #06-333 review board, and the family was enrolled in the study under informed consent, including consent to publish the study’s findings. All experiments involving the use of zebrafish (Danio rerio) were approved by the Duke University Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for publication of clinical details and clinical images was obtained from the parent of the probands.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: NK is a paid consultant and holds founding stock in Rescindo Therapeutics.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
